@LordSebas this is not Netorare, this is Baishun. Baishun: Literally means " prostituting". Is when a person let their relatives or friends being fucked by others likes prostitutes (That's why the term.) The only exception is a romantic partner. Netorare in the other hand literally means "Cuckhold", Cukhold means cheating in front of the partners(Also it became twisted through the time, now is basically all types of cheating).
